name: Edwin Alonso Jiménez Rojas
professional_profile: Software Analysis and Development Technician with experience in web and desktop application development. Participated in billing system implementation, database management, API consumption, application refactoring, and user interface creation. Skilled in CSS, HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, React, and Python. Over 10 years of experience in the graphic arts sector, which strengthened design sense, operational leadership, and attention to detail. Strong teamwork, emotional intelligence, positive attitude, and attention to detail.

achievements: Designed and developed dynamic web interfaces using JavaScript, DataTables, and Bootstrap, improving user experience.
Refactored 50% of an existing application, enhancing performance and automating Central Bank API queries.
Implemented PHPSpreadsheet for automated Excel report generation, reducing analysis time.

projects: Linker Web App (Linktree-type): responsive platform using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
API Integration: web app connecting maps and weather APIs to show real-time data.
Web Security: implemented encryption and secure authentication best practices.

experience.role: Graphic Designer / Prepress Specialist / Large Format Printer
experience.summary: Worked in graphic arts both in companies and as a freelancer, ensuring quality and client satisfaction.

education.degree: Professional Technician in Software Analysis and Development

certifications: Google Cloud Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure – Coursera
Architecting with Google Kubernetes Engine – Coursera
Agile Methodologies – Universidad Católica de Oriente (Comfama)
goals: Continue learning and growing professionally in software development, improving English skills, and participating in projects that integrate technology and design.
